      • insertElements

        private void insertElements(int[] a,
                  int[][] bucket,
                  int pass)
        inserts the elements into the bucket array
        Parameters:
        a - Array containing the values
        bucket - 2d Array of the bucket that holds all the values that need to be sorted
        pass - Passes in the variable for which pass through the bucket is being sorted
